sentences.en: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.cn: 冻住的污水管

sentences.en: A pipe had burst in the kitchen and flooded the floor.
sentences.cn: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

sentences.en: a water pipe
sentences.cn: 水管

sentences.en: copper pipes
sentences.cn: 铜管

sentences.en: Dad was there, smoking his pipe.
sentences.cn: 爸爸在那里吸着烟斗。

sentences.en: Don't let the wire rub up against the pipe.
sentences.cn: 别让电线碰到管子上.

sentences.en: He chewed the stem of his pipe and eyed her sceptically.
sentences.cn: 他嘴里衔着烟斗柄，满腹狐疑地打量着她。

sentences.en: He knocked out his pipe in the big glass ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他在大玻璃烟灰缸里磕净烟斗.

sentences.en: He nodded and puffed on a stubby pipe as he listened.
sentences.cn: 他边听边点头，还吸着一支粗短的烟斗。

sentences.en: He pointed at me with the stem of his pipe.
sentences.cn: 他用烟斗柄指着我。

sentences.en: He smacked the bowl of his pipe into his hand.
sentences.cn: 他在自己手上磕打烟斗。

sentences.en: He took a puff on his pipe and shook his head.
sentences.cn: 他抽了口烟斗，摇了摇头。

sentences.en: Join one section of pipe to the next.
sentences.cn: 将一段管子与相邻的管子连接起来。

sentences.en: Just pipe down and I'll tell you what I want.
sentences.cn: 别说了，我来告诉你我想要什么。

sentences.en: Make sure the washer is firmly seated before tightening the pipe.
sentences.cn: 旋紧水管之前,检查一下洗衣机是否已牢牢地固定在底座上了.

sentences.en: Philpott tamped a wad of tobacco into his pipe.
sentences.cn: 菲尔波特往烟斗里塞了一卷碎烟叶。

sentences.en: The pipe disgorges sewage into the sea.
sentences.cn: 这管道将污水排入大海。

sentences.en: The room held the faint, sweet odour of pipe tobacco.
sentences.cn: 房间内有烟斗烟丝的淡淡馨香。

sentences.en: villages with no piped water
sentences.cn: 没有管道供水的乡村

sentences.en: When the pipe leaked, we sent for a plumber.
sentences.cn: 煤气或水管漏了的时候, 我们就派人去找一位管子工.

sentences.en: You could waste your whole life on a pipe-dream.
sentences.cn: 白日梦会荒废你一生。

words.tran_cn: 吹笛的；平静的；乐声优雅的；尖声的
以管输送；输送费；输送管
吹笛者；风笛手；管道工；绿鳍鱼；气喘的马
用管道输送；尖声唱（pipe的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（使）停止讲话；（使）安静下来
使安静下来：停止说话；安静
v. 用电讯设备传送；用管道输入；吹奏管乐器迎入
(航海)（吹长口哨）通知（水手）下班
n. 管柱，一段管线；管道支线

phrases.phrase: put that in one's pipe and smoke it
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［用于要求别人接受不中听的话］这事你看着办吧；这事你考虑考虑

trans.tran_en: a tube through which a liquid or gas flows

trans.tran_cn: 用管子输送，用线路系统传输，用管乐器演奏，用尖嗓子说，裱花
trans.tran_en: to make a musical sound, using a pipe

trans.tran_cn: 用管道输送；用线路系统传输
trans.tran_en: to send a liquid or gas through a pipe to another place
